channel.title: Can't Set NPC Drops. Please Help!
channel.description:
Okay well i spawned a monster then compiled and then ran and it was where I wanted it to be and everything then when I went to npcdrops.java and then I copied one of the already made nes and it looked like this[code]npcdrop = 1 2 1203 1 882 7 877 1 877 2 877 3 [/code] so then I pressed enter then paste and changed the ID to 50 for KBD and then since the second one was drop type i changed it to 1 and then i put 773(item ID) then 1(amount) then 774 1 and then i saved then compiled then ran the server and it didn't drop anything. PLease tell me how I can fix this. BTW it looks like this
[code]npcdrop = 50 1 773 1 774 1[/code]

item.title: Can't Set NPC Drops. Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

it should look like this

npcdrop = 50 1085 1 1 this is format npcdrop = (monsterid)(tab)(itemid)(tab)(ammountdropped)(tab)(percentofdrop)

any spaces other than the first 2 are bad. You need to do this format for each item drop you are adding.

Read full topic
